info.name: RedServer DarkTheme v2.0
info.description:
Night Theme for RedServer.su Forum 

Developed by MoriDanWork a.k. Kid_Flash

style.css:
/* ==UserStyle==
@name           RedServer DarkTheme
@namespace      https://github.com/MoriDanWork/RS-Night-Theme
@version        2.0.5
@description    Night Theme for RedServer Forum.
@author         MoriDanWork
==/UserStyle== */
@-moz-document url-prefix("https://redserver.su/forum/")
{
    /* Body */
    body
    {
        background-image: url("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MoriDanWork/RS-Night-Theme/main/Resourses/Background.jpg");
        background-color: #1d244f;
        background-attachment: fixed;
        background-size: cover;
    }

    /* Gradient */
    #gradientCon
    {
        display: none;
    }


    #ipsLayout_body
    {
        border-radius: 10px;
    }

    /* BackGround Colors*/
    #ipsLayout_body,
    body[data-role="internalEmbed"],
    .ipsDataList_readStatus .ipsDataItem:not( .ipsDataItem_unread):not( .ipsDataItem_selected):not( .ipsModerated),
    .main_menu > li.dropdown .dropdown_menu,
    .ipsComposeArea_unavailable .ipsComposeArea_editor,
    .ipsAreaBackground_reset,
    .ipsTabs_activeItem,
    .ipsTabs_panel,
    .ipsMenu,
    .ipsAutocompleteMenu_item[data-selected],
    .ipsComment.ipsFieldRow_fullWidth.ipsAreaBackground_light.ipsPad,
    .ipsComment_subComments .ipsComment,
    .cProfileSidebarBlock.ipsLeaderboard_trophy_1,
    .ipsApp select,
    .ipsSelectTree_nodes
    {
        background-color: #1F2936;
    }

    #elSearchExpanded,
    .ipsQuote,
    .ipsSpoiler,
    .ipsStyle_spoiler,
    .ipsRichEmbed,
    .cNotifcationPrompt,
    .ipsCoverPhoto_container,
    .ipsPageHead_special,
    .ipsApp .ipsButton:not( .ipsButton_noHover):hover,
    .ipsMenu_item:not( .ipsMenu_itemClicked) a:hover .ipsMenu_itemCount,
    .ipsMenu_item:not( .ipsMenu_itemClicked) button:hover .ipsMenu_itemCount,
    .ipsComposeArea_dummy,
    #cbInput_container input,
    a.cke_button_off:hover,
    a.cke_button_off:focus,
    a.cke_button_off:active,
    a.cke_button_disabled:hover,
    a.cke_button_disabled:focus,
    a.cke_button_disabled:active,
    .ipsSideMenu_item:not( .ipsSideMenu_itemActive) a:hover,
    a.ipsSideMenu_item:not( .ipsSideMenu_itemActive):hover,
    span.ipsSideMenu_item:not( .ipsSideMenu_itemActive):hover,
    .ipsEmoticons_item:hover,
    .cStreamFilter > li > a.cStreamFilter_active,
    .ipsStreamItem.ipsStreamItem_contentBlock,
    .ipsAlert,
    .ipsPagination .ipsPagination_page.ipsPagination_active a,
    .ipsButtonBar .ipsPagination .ipsPagination_page.ipsPagination_active a,
    .cke_wysiwyg_frame,
    .cke_wysiwyg_div,
    .main_menu > li.dropdown .dropdown_menu > a:active,
    .ipsToggle.ipsToggle_off,
    .ipsAreaBackground_light .ipsButtonRow li > a:not( .ipsButtonRow_active),
    .ipsAreaBackground_light .ipsButtonRow li > button:not( .ipsButtonRow_active),
    .ipsAreaBackground_light .ipsButtonRow li > span:not( .ipsButtonRow_active),
    .cPastLeaders_cell,
    .cProfileRepScore_neutral,
    .ipsSideMenu_item.ipsSideMenu_itemActive,
    .cPollVoteBar,
    .cPost.ipsModerated,
    .cPost.ipsModerated .cAuthorPane,
    .cPost.ipsComment_selected:not( .ipsComment_moderated),
    .ipsModerated,
    body.unloaded #ipsEmbedLoading,
    .ipsHovercard_loading,
    .cke_combo_off a.cke_combo_button:hover,
    .cke_combo_off a.cke_combo_button:focus,
    .cke_combo_off a.cke_combo_button:active,
    .cke_combo_on a.cke_combo_button,
    .cStreamForm_list li a.ipsSideMenu_item.ipsSideMenu_itemActive + .cStreamForm_menu,
    .cStreamForm_list li a.ipsSideMenu_item:not( .ipsSideMenu_itemActive):hover + .cStreamForm_menu,
    .ipsSelectTree_selected,
    .ipsSelectTree_nodes [data-role="nodeList"] li .ipsSelectTree_item:not( .ipsSelectTree_itemDisabled):hover
    {
        background-color: #242f3d;
    }

    .ipsApp .ipsButton_medium,
    .ipsApp .ipsButton_primary,
    .ipsDataItem_subList li.ipsDataItem_unread a:before,
    .ipsItemStatus.ipsItemStatus_large,
    .ipsStreamItem_time,
    .ipsApp .ipsButton_light,
    html[dir] .ipsStream_withTimeline .ipsStreamItem.ipsStreamItem_actionBlock:after,
    .ipsApp .ipsButton_link.ipsFollow,
    .ipsApp .ipsButton_link.ipsPromote,
    .ipsButtonBar .ipsButtonRow li > a,
    .ipsButtonBar .ipsButtonRow li > button,
    .ipsButtonBar .ipsButtonRow li > span,
    .ipsApp .ipsButton_veryLight,
    .ipsApp .ipsButton_important,
    .main_menu > li.dropdown .dropdown_menu > a:hover,
    .ipsToggle.ipsToggle_on,
    .ipsTags .ipsTag,
    .ipsTag_prefix,
    .ipsBadge_positive,
    .ipsBadge_style4,
    .cAnnouncementPageTop,
    .cAnnouncementPageTop a,
    .cAnnouncementSidebar.ipsMessage a,
    .cAnnouncementContentTop.ipsMessage a,
    .ipsPagination:not( .ipsPagination_mini) .ipsPagination_page a,
    .ipsPagination:not( .ipsPagination_mini) .ipsPagination_next a,
    .ipsPagination:not( .ipsPagination_mini) .ipsPagination_prev a,
    .ipsPagination:not( .ipsPagination_mini) .ipsPagination_first a,
    .ipsPagination:not( .ipsPagination_mini) .ipsPagination_last a,
    .ipsApp .ipsButtonBar .ipsPagination .ipsPagination_page a,
    .ipsApp .ipsButtonBar .ipsPagination .ipsPagination_next a,
    .ipsApp .ipsButtonBar .ipsPagination .ipsPagination_prev a,
    .ipsApp .ipsButtonBar .ipsPagination .ipsPagination_first a,
    .ipsApp .ipsButtonBar .ipsPagination .ipsPagination_last a,
    .ipsTabs,
    #snow_toggle_button.enabled > .switcher,
    .ipsTabs.ipsTabs_stretch [role="tablist"] > li,
    .ipsLeaderboard_trophy_1,
    .ipsLeaderboard_trophy_1.ipsLeaderboard_trophy:before,
    .ipsLeaderboard_trophy_1.ipsLeaderboard_trophy:after,
    .cToken,
    .ipsCustomInput input[type="checkbox"]:checked + span,
    .ipsApp .ipsButton_normal,
    .ipsType_pageTitle [data-role="editableTitle"]:hover,
    .ipsType_pageTitle[data-role="editableTitle"]:hover,
    .ipsType_editable:hover,
    a[data-mentionid]
    {
        background-color: #276899
    }

    .ipsApp .ipsButton.cMultiQuote,
    .ipsRichEmbed_originalItem.ipsPad,
    .ipsRichEmbed_originalItem .ipsPad,
    .ipsMemberCard,
    .ipsComment,
    .ipsAutocompleteMenu,
    .ipsImageAttach_thumb,
    .ipsDialog > div,
    .ipsDataList,
    .ipsBox:not( .ipsBox_transparent):not( .ipsModerated),
    p.ipsType_reset.ipsPad_half,
    a.cke_button_on,
    .ipsHovercard,
    #elSearchExpanded .ipsSideMenu_list,
    a.cke_combo_button,
    .ipsSelectTree_nodes [data-role="nodeList"] li .ipsSelectTree_item:not( .ipsSelectTree_itemDisabled).ipsSelectTree_selected:hover
    {
        background-color: #1b2734;
    }

    .ipsWidget.ipsWidget_vertical .ipsWidget_title,
    .ipsWidget.ipsWidget_horizontal .ipsWidget_title,
    .ipsButtonBar,
    .ipsType_sectionTitle,
    .ipsMenu_title,
    .cStreamFilter,
    .ipsSpoiler_header,
    #elSearchExpanded .ipsMenu_title,
    .ipsSideMenu_subTitle,
    .ipsMenu_headerBar,
    .ipsMenu_footerBar,
    ul:not( .ipsMenu_keyNav) .ipsMenu_item:not( .ipsMenu_itemClicked):not( .ipsMenu_itemDisabled) a:not( .ipsMenu_itemInline):hover,
    .ipsMenu_item[data-selected] a,
    .ipsMenu_item[data-selected] span,
    .ipsMenu_item.ipsMenu_hover,
    .cke_top,
    .ipsFieldRow_section,
    select option:hover,
    select option:focus,
    select option:active,
    select option:checked,
    select option:focus-within,
    select option:target
    {
        background-color: #17222d;
    }

    .ipsDialog_title,
    .ipsType_medium:not( .ipsType_richText),
    .ipsComment:not( .ipsModerated) .ipsComment_header,
    #elProfileActivityOverview .ipsStreamItem,
    #elUserContent .ipsStreamItem,
    #elSingleStatusUpdate .ipsStreamItem,
    .ipsDialog_title,
    .ipsType_medium:not( .ipsType_richText),
    .ipsComment:not( .ipsModerated) .ipsComment_header,
    .ipsUserPhoto,
    .ipsComposeArea_editor,
    .ipsButton.ipsButton_link,
    .cPost.ipsComment:not( .ipsComment_selected):not( .ipsModerated) .cAuthorPane,
    .ipsTabs_panels.ipsTabs_contained,
    .cPastLeaders_title span,
    .cke_inner,
    .ipsSideMenu_itemActive a,
    a.ipsSideMenu_itemActive,
    span.ipsSideMenu_itemActive,
    .ipsSideMenu_withChecks .ipsSideMenu_item > input[type="checkbox"]:checked ~ a,
    .ipsSideMenu_withChecks .ipsSideMenu_item > input[type="checkbox"]:checked ~ span,
    .ipsSideMenu_withRadios .ipsSideMenu_item > input[type="radio"]:checked ~ a,
    .ipsSideMenu_withRadios .ipsSideMenu_item > input[type="radio"]:checked ~ span,
    .ipsDialog .ipsDialog_loading
    {
        background-color: transparent;
    }

    .ipsReact_reactCount,
    .ipsMenu_itemCount,
    .ipsSideMenu_itemCount,
    .ipsCode,
    .ipsTooltip
    {
        background-color: #283a4d;
    }

    .ipsApp .ipsDataItem_new,
    .ipsApp .ipsDataItem_success,
    .cbDisconnect
    {
        background-color: #2A3E52;
    }


    .ipsFollow .ipsCommentCount,
    .ipsStream .ipsStreamItem_contentType,
    .ipsAttachment_progress,
    .ipsFollow .ipsCommentCount,
    #elSearch,
    .ipsCustomInput > span
    {
        background-color: #DEDEDE;
    }

    .ipsApp .ipsField_autocomplete,
    html[dir="ltr"] .ipsApp .ipsField_autocomplete,
    .ipsApp textarea,
    .ipsApp input[type="text"],
    .ipsApp input[type="password"],
    .ipsApp input[type="datetime"],
    .ipsApp input[type="datetime-local"],
    .ipsApp input[type="date"],
    .ipsApp input[type="time"],
    .ipsApp input[type="number"],
    .ipsApp input[type="email"],
    .ipsApp input[type="url"],
    .ipsApp .ipsField_dummy,
    .ipsQuote_citation,
    .ipsAreaBackground,
    .ipsAreaBackground_light,
    .ipsTabs.ipsTabs_contained,
    .ipsTabs_panels.ipsTabs_contained,
    .ipsButtonRow li > a,
    .ipsButtonRow li > button,
    .ipsButtonRow li > span,
    hr.ipsHr,
    .ipsApp select:not( [multiple]),
    .ipsQuote_citation,
    iframe[data-embedContent].ipsEmbed_finishedLoading,
    #elProfileStats,
    #elClubControls .ipsTabs,
    .cke_toolbar_separator
    {
        background-color: #19242f;
    }

    .ipsDataList.ipsDataList_zebra .ipsDataItem:not( .ipsDataItem_selected):not( .ipsModerated):not( .ipsDataItem_new):not( .ipsDataItem_success):not( .ipsDataItem_warning):not( .ipsDataItem_error):not( .ipsDataItem_info):not( .ipsDataItem_status):nth-child(even)
    {
        background-color: #1D2A38;
    }

    .cMessage_active
    {
        background-color: #19242f !important;
    }


    /* Colors */
    .ipsType_warning,
    .ipsType_negative
    {
        color: #d24949;
    }

    .main_menu > li.dropdown .dropdown_menu > a:active,
    #elSearchExpanded,
    .ipsWidget.ipsWidget_vertical .ipsWidget_title,
    .ipsWidget.ipsWidget_horizontal .ipsWidget_title,
    .ipsButtonBar,
    .ipsType_sectionTitle,
    .ipsMenu_title,
    .cStreamFilter,
    .ipsSpoiler_header,
    #elSearchExpanded .ipsMenu_title,
    .ipsSideMenu_subTitle,
    .ipsMenu_headerBar,
    .ipsMenu_footerBar,
    .ipsToggle.ipsToggle_off,
    .ipsType_pageTitle,
    .ipsQuote_citation.ipsQuote_open,
    .ipsQuote_citation.ipsQuote_closed,
    .ipsType_richText,
    .ipsStreamItem_snippet .ipsType_richText,
    .ipsReact_reactCount > a > span:last-child,
    #ipsLayout_footer a,
    #ipsLayout_footer p,
    .ipsMenu_item > a:not( .ipsMenu_itemInline),
    .cStreamFilter a,
    .ipsMenu_item > span:not( .ipsMenu_itemInline),
    .cStreamFilter h3,
    .ipsPagination .ipsPagination_pageJump a,
    h3.ipsType_reset.ipsType_large.cStreamForm_title.ipsSpacer_top,
    .ipsPager_title,
    .ipsPager_type,
    .ipsTruncate.ipsTruncate_line,
    .ipsTabs_activeItem,
    a.ipsType_blendLinks,
    .ipsMenu_footerBar a,
    .ipsButtonBar .ipsButtonRow li > a,
    .cStreamFilter > li > a,
    .ipsSideMenu_item a,
    a.ipsSideMenu_item,
    a.ipsTabs_item,
    a.cForumToggle,
    a.ipsReact_unreact,
    #elEmoticons_chatbox,
    a.ipsDialog_close,
    .ipsPagination_pageJump a,
    .ipsComment_controls > li > a,
    .cProfileSidebarBlock.ipsBox > a,
    a.ipsLightbox_close,
    li.ipsReact_reactCount > a,
    label.ipsFieldRow_label,
    .ipsType_large:not( .ipsType_richText),
    .cMessage_members,
    #elUserNav > li > a,
    #elFooterSocialLinks > li > a,
    .main_menu > li,
    .main_menu > li > a,
    .ipsFieldRow_section,
    #elProfileStats,
    .cAnnouncementPageTop,
    .cAnnouncementPageTop a,
    .cAnnouncementSidebar.ipsMessage a,
    .cAnnouncementContentTop.ipsMessage a,
    .ipsQuote_citation,
    .ipsDialog_title,
    .ipsType_medium:not( .ipsType_richText),
    .ipsComment:not( .ipsModerated) .ipsComment_header,
    p.ipsType_reset.ipsPad_half,
    .ipsApp .ipsButton:not( .ipsButton_noHover):hover,
    .ipsMenu_item:not( .ipsMenu_itemClicked) a:hover .ipsMenu_itemCount,
    .ipsMenu_item:not( .ipsMenu_itemClicked) button:hover .ipsMenu_itemCount,
    .pun,
    .opn,
    .clo,
    .pln,
    .kwd,
    .lit,
    .ipsDataItem,
    .ipsApp .ipsField_autocomplete:focus,
    .ipsApp textarea:focus,
    .ipsApp input[type="text"]:focus,
    .ipsApp input[type="password"]:focus,
    .ipsApp input[type="datetime"]:focus,
    .ipsApp input[type="datetime-local"]:focus,
    .ipsApp input[type="date"]:focus,
    .ipsApp input[type="time"]:focus,
    .ipsApp input[type="number"]:focus,
    .ipsApp input[type="email"]:focus,
    .ipsApp input[type="url"]:focus,
    .ipsApp .ipsField_dummy:focus .ipsApp .ipsField_autocomplete:hover,
    .ipsApp textarea:hover,
    .ipsApp input[type="text"]:hover,
    .ipsApp input[type="password"]:hover,
    .ipsApp input[type="datetime"]:hover,
    .ipsApp input[type="datetime-local"]:hover,
    .ipsApp input[type="date"]:hover,
    .ipsApp input[type="time"]:hover,
    .ipsApp input[type="number"]:hover,
    .ipsApp input[type="email"]:hover,
    .ipsApp input[type="url"]:hover,
    .ipsApp .ipsField_dummy:hover,
    .ipsComposeArea_dummy,
    #cbInput_container input,
    .cStreamFilter > li > a.cStreamFilter_active,
    .ipsStreamItem.ipsStreamItem_contentBlock,
    .ipsAlert,
    .ipsAreaBackground_light .ipsButtonRow li > a:not( .ipsButtonRow_active),
    .ipsAreaBackground_light .ipsButtonRow li > button:not( .ipsButtonRow_active),
    .ipsAreaBackground_light .ipsButtonRow li > span:not( .ipsButtonRow_active),
    .cPastLeaders_cell:after,
    .ipsButtonRow li > a,
    .ipsButtonRow li > button,
    .ipsButtonRow li > span,
    .cForumMiniList.cForumMiniList_multiRoot > li > a,
    .ipsType_small,
    .ipsType_reset,
    .cProfileRepScore_neutral,
    .ipsApp select,
    select option:hover,
    select option:focus,
    select option:active,
    select option:checked,
    .cPollVoteBar > span.cPollVoteBar_inside:after,
    .ipsModerated .ipsType_light,
    .ipsApp .ipsButton_normal,
    .ipsApp label:not( .ipsField_unlimited),
    .ipsType_pageTitle [data-role="editableTitle"]:hover,
    .ipsType_pageTitle[data-role="editableTitle"]:hover,
    .ipsType_editable:hover,
    .ipsTooltip,
    #elErrorMessage,
    select[disabled] > option,
    .ipsSelectTree_placeholder,
    .ipsSideMenu_itemActive a,
    a.ipsSideMenu_itemActive,
    span.ipsSideMenu_itemActive,
    .ipsSideMenu_withChecks .ipsSideMenu_item > input[type="checkbox"]:checked ~ a,
    .ipsSideMenu_withChecks .ipsSideMenu_item > input[type="checkbox"]:checked ~ span,
    .ipsSideMenu_withRadios .ipsSideMenu_item > input[type="radio"]:checked ~ a,
    .ipsSideMenu_withRadios .ipsSideMenu_item > input[type="radio"]:checked ~ span,
    .ipsSelectTree_itemDisabled > [data-role="nodeTitle"],
    .ipsSelectTree_nodes [data-role="nodeList"] li .ipsSelectTree_item:not( .ipsSelectTree_itemDisabled):hover,
    .main_menu .dropdown_menu .ipsMenu_title,
    .ipsType_veryLarge,
    .cPollVoteBar > span:after
    {
        Color: #C5C5C5;
    }


    .ipsApp .ipsButton_medium,
    .ipsApp .ipsButton_primary,
    .ipsDataItem_subList li.ipsDataItem_unread a:before,
    .ipsItemStatus.ipsItemStatus_large,
    .ipsStreamItem_time,
    .ipsApp .ipsButton_light,
    html[dir] .ipsStream_withTimeline .ipsStreamItem.ipsStreamItem_actionBlock:after,
    .ipsApp .ipsButton_link.ipsFollow,
    .ipsApp .ipsButton_link.ipsPromote,
    .ipsButtonBar .ipsButtonRow li > a,
    .ipsButtonBar .ipsButtonRow li > button,
    .ipsButtonBar .ipsButtonRow li > span,
    .ipsApp .ipsButton_veryLight,
    .ipsApp .ipsButton_important,
    .cProfileSidebarBlock.ipsLeaderboard_trophy_1,
    .ipsPagination:not( .ipsPagination_mini) .ipsPagination_page a,
    .ipsPagination:not( .ipsPagination_mini) .ipsPagination_next a,
    .ipsPagination:not( .ipsPagination_mini) .ipsPagination_prev a,
    .ipsPagination:not( .ipsPagination_mini) .ipsPagination_first a,
    .ipsPagination:not( .ipsPagination_mini) .ipsPagination_last a,
    .ipsApp .ipsButtonBar .ipsPagination .ipsPagination_page a,
    .ipsApp .ipsButtonBar .ipsPagination .ipsPagination_next a,
    .ipsApp .ipsButtonBar .ipsPagination .ipsPagination_prev a,
    .ipsApp .ipsButtonBar .ipsPagination .ipsPagination_first a,
    .ipsApp .ipsButtonBar .ipsPagination .ipsPagination_last a,
    .ipsTabs,
    .ipsPagination .ipsPagination_page.ipsPagination_active a,
    .ipsButtonBar .ipsPagination .ipsPagination_page.ipsPagination_active a,
    .ipsButtonBar .ipsPagination .ipsPagination_pageJump a,
    .cke_combo__fontsize .cke_combo_text,
    .fa-trophy:before,
    a[data-mentionid]
    {
        color: #eaeaea;
    }

    .ipsSpoiler_header.ipsSpoiler_closed [data-action='toggleSpoiler']:before,
    .ipsPager .ipsPager_next a:after,
    .ipsPager .ipsPager_prev a:after,
    .fa-bell:before,
    .fa-envelope:before,
    .fa-external-link-square:before,
    .fa-pencil-square:before,
    .fa-user:before,
    .fa-plus:before,
    .fa-search:before,
    .fa-fire:before,
    .fa-navicon:before,
    .fa-reorder:before,
    .fa-bars:before,
    .icon-spinner2:before,
    .fa-exclamation-circle:before,
    .fa-chevron-down:before,
    .ipsSideMenu_withChecks .ipsSideMenu_itemActive a:after,
    .ipsSideMenu_withChecks a.ipsSideMenu_itemActive:after,
    .ipsSideMenu_withChecks span.ipsSideMenu_itemActive:after,
    .ipsSideMenu_withRadios .ipsSideMenu_itemActive a:after,
    .ipsSideMenu_withRadios a.ipsSideMenu_itemActive:after,
    .ipsSideMenu_withRadios span.ipsSideMenu_itemActive:after,
    .ipsMenu_selectable .ipsMenu_item:not( .ipsMenu_itemNonSelect) a:before,
    .ipsMenu_selectable .ipsMenu_item:not( .ipsMenu_itemNonSelect) > span:before,
    .ipsMenu_selectable .ipsMenu_item:not( .ipsMenu_itemNonSelect) button:before,
    .ipsSideMenu_withChecks .ipsSideMenu_item > input[type="checkbox"]:checked ~ a:after,
    .ipsSideMenu_withChecks .ipsSideMenu_item > input[type="checkbox"]:checked ~ span:not(.ipsSideMenu_noCheck):after,
    .ipsSideMenu_withRadios .ipsSideMenu_item > input[type="radio"]:checked ~ a:after,
    .ipsSideMenu_withRadios .ipsSideMenu_item > input[type="radio"]:checked ~ span:not(.ipsSideMenu_noCheck):after
    {
        color: #bdbdbd;
    }

    i.fa.fa-user,
    .ipsPip:before,
    .fa-comment:before,
    .fa-circle:before,
    a:hover,
    a:active,
    .ipsTabs_activeItem:hover,
    .main_menu > li.dropdown:hover > a,
    .main_menu > li.dropdown:hover:after,
    .ipsType_noLinkStyling:hover,
    .ipsModerated a,
    .ipsRating .ipsRating_on .fa-star
    {
        color: #5080B6;
    }



    .ipsPagination.ipsPagination_mini a,
    .main_menu > li.dropdown .dropdown_menu > a:hover,
    .ipsToggle.ipsToggle_on,
    .main_menu > li.dropdown .dropdown_menu,
    .ipsType_break,
    .ipsReact_overview,
    .ipsType_normal:not( .ipsType_richText),
    .ipsList_reset,
    .ipsType_sectionHead,
    .ipsQuote .ipsQuote_citation a,
    a,
    .ipsReact_reactCount,
    .ipsMenu_itemCount,
    .ipsSideMenu_itemCount
    {
        color: #DEDEDE;
    }

    .ipsTags .ipsTag,
    .ipsTag_prefix,
    .ipsBadge_positive,
    .ipsBadge_style4,
    .cAnnouncementPageTop,
    .cAnnouncementPageTop a,
    .cAnnouncementSidebar.ipsMessage a,
    .cAnnouncementContentTop.ipsMessage a
    {
        color: #DEDEDE !important;
    }


    .ipsApp .ipsField_autocomplete,
    html[dir="ltr"] .ipsApp .ipsField_autocomplete,
    .ipsApp textarea,
    .ipsApp input[type="text"],
    .ipsApp input[type="password"],
    .ipsApp input[type="datetime"],
    .ipsApp input[type="datetime-local"],
    .ipsApp input[type="date"],
    .ipsApp input[type="time"],
    .ipsApp input[type="number"],
    .ipsApp input[type="email"],
    .ipsApp input[type="url"],
    .ipsApp .ipsField_dummy,
    .ipsAreaBackground,
    .ipsAreaBackground_light,
    .ipsType_noLinkStyling
    {
        color: #8d9aa6;
    }

    /* Border Color */
    .ipsCommentUnreadSeperator,
    .main_menu > li.selected:not(.dropdown) > a,
    .main_menu > li.selected.dropdown:not(:hover) > a,
    .main_menu > li:not(.dropdown) > a:active,
    html[dir="ltr"] .ipsStream.ipsStream_withTimeline,
    .ipsComment.ipsComment_selected,
    html[dir="ltr"] .cStreamForm_nodes,
    .ipsLoading:before
    {
        border-color: #276899;
    }

    .ipsMenu_sep,
    #elSearchExpanded .ipsSideMenu_list,
    .ipsBox.ipsModerated
    {
        border-color: #131d26;
    }

    .ipsApp .ipsButton_medium,
    .ipsApp .ipsButton_primary,
    .ipsDataItem_subList li.ipsDataItem_unread a:before,
    .ipsItemStatus.ipsItemStatus_large,
    .ipsStreamItem_time,
    .ipsApp .ipsButton_light,
    html[dir] .ipsStream_withTimeline .ipsStreamItem.ipsStreamItem_actionBlock:after,
    .ipsApp .ipsButton_link.ipsFollow,
    .ipsApp .ipsButton_link.ipsPromote,
    .ipsButtonBar .ipsButtonRow li > a,
    .ipsButtonBar .ipsButtonRow li > button,
    .ipsButtonBar .ipsButtonRow li > span,
    .ipsApp .ipsButton_veryLight,
    .ipsApp .ipsButton_important,
    .ipsApp .ipsButton_link,
    html[dir="ltr"] .ipsButton_split > li:not( :first-child) > .ipsButton,
    .ipsSelectTree_nodes [data-role="nodeList"]
    {
        border-color: transparent;
    }

    .ipsQuote,
    .ipsSpoiler,
    .ipsStyle_spoiler,
    .ipsRichEmbed,
    .cNotifcationPrompt,
    .ipsCoverPhoto_container,
    .ipsPageHead_special,
    .ipsMemberCard,
    .ipsComment:not( .ipsModerated) .ipsComment_header,
    .ipsCode,
    .ipsBox,
    .ipsMenu,
    html[dir="ltr"] .ipsReact_blurb:not( .ipsHide) + .ipsReact_types,
    .ipsTabs.ipsTabs_contained,
    .ipsTabs_panels.ipsTabs_contained,
    .cPastLeaders_title:before,
    .ipsHovercard,
    .ipsApp select,
    .ipsSelectTree,
    .ipsSelectTree_nodes,
    .ipsSelectTree_active.ipsSelectTree_top
    {
        border-color: #101921;
    }

    .ipsApp .ipsField_autocomplete,
    html[dir="ltr"] .ipsApp .ipsField_autocomplete,
    .ipsApp textarea,
    .ipsApp input[type="text"],
    .ipsApp input[type="password"],
    .ipsApp input[type="datetime"],
    .ipsApp input[type="datetime-local"],
    .ipsApp input[type="date"],
    .ipsApp input[type="time"],
    .ipsApp input[type="number"],
    .ipsApp input[type="email"],
    .ipsApp input[type="url"],
    .ipsApp .ipsField_dummy,
    .ipsDataItem,
    .ipsButton_split > .ipsButton.ipsButton_link,
    html[dir] .ipsButton_split > li > .ipsButton.ipsButton_link,
    .ipsQuote_citation
    {
        border-color: #131D27;
    }

    .ipsMenu_headerBar,
    .ipsMenu_footerBar,
    html[dir="ltr"] .cMessage_members > ol > li,
    #elSearchExpanded .ipsSideMenu_list,
    #elSearchExpanded .ipsMenu_title,
    .ipsItemControls
    {
        border-color: #19242f;
    }

    .ipsApp .ipsField_autocomplete:focus,
    .ipsApp textarea:focus,
    .ipsApp input[type="text"]:focus,
    .ipsApp input[type="password"]:focus,
    .ipsApp input[type="datetime"]:focus,
    .ipsApp input[type="datetime-local"]:focus,
    .ipsApp input[type="date"]:focus,
    .ipsApp input[type="time"]:focus,
    .ipsApp input[type="number"]:focus,
    .ipsApp input[type="email"]:focus,
    .ipsApp input[type="url"]:focus,
    .ipsApp .ipsField_dummy:focus .ipsApp .ipsField_autocomplete:hover,
    .ipsApp textarea:hover,
    .ipsApp input[type="text"]:hover,
    .ipsApp input[type="password"]:hover,
    .ipsApp input[type="datetime"]:hover,
    .ipsApp input[type="datetime-local"]:hover,
    .ipsApp input[type="date"]:hover,
    .ipsApp input[type="time"]:hover,
    .ipsApp input[type="number"]:hover,
    .ipsApp input[type="email"]:hover,
    .ipsApp input[type="url"]:hover,
    .ipsApp .ipsField_dummy:hover,
    a.cke_combo_button,
    .cke_combo_off a.cke_combo_button:active,
    .cke_combo_on a.cke_combo_button
    {
        border-color: #242f3d;
    }

    .ipsStreamItem.ipsStreamItem_contentBlock,
    .ipsAlert
    {
        border-color: #17222d;
    }

    .ipsPagination .ipsPagination_page.ipsPagination_active a,
    .ipsButtonBar .ipsPagination .ipsPagination_page.ipsPagination_active a
    {
        border-color: #3e4148;
    }

    /* Other */
    .ipsApp .ipsField_autocomplete,
    .ipsApp textarea,
    .ipsApp input[type="text"],
    .ipsApp input[type="password"],
    .ipsApp input[type="datetime"],
    .ipsApp input[type="datetime-local"],
    .ipsApp input[type="date"],
    .ipsApp input[type="time"],
    .ipsApp input[type="number"],
    .ipsApp input[type="email"],
    .ipsApp input[type="url"],
    .ipsApp .ipsField_dummy,
    .ipsApp .ipsField_autocomplete:focus,
    .ipsApp textarea:focus,
    .ipsApp input[type="text"]:focus,
    .ipsApp input[type="password"]:focus,
    .ipsApp input[type="datetime"]:focus,
    .ipsApp input[type="datetime-local"]:focus,
    .ipsApp input[type="date"]:focus,
    .ipsApp input[type="time"]:focus,
    .ipsApp input[type="number"]:focus,
    .ipsApp input[type="email"]:focus,
    .ipsApp input[type="url"]:focus,
    .ipsApp .ipsField_dummy:focus,
    a.cke_combo_button,
    .ipsComment.ipsComment_selected,
    .cke_combo_off a.cke_combo_button:active,
    .cke_combo_on a.cke_combo_button,
    .cke_combo_on a.cke_combo_button:hover,
    .cke_combo_on a.cke_combo_button:focus,
    .cke_combo_on a.cke_combo_button:active,
    .ipsApp .cke_widget_wrapper:hover .cke_widget_editable.cke_widget_editable_focused
    {
        box-shadow: none;
    }

    a:hover,
    a:active,
    .ipsTabs_activeItem:hover
    {
        text-decoration: none;
    }

    .ipsPagination.ipsPagination_mini a
    {
        background: #27689929;
    }

    .ipsReact_types ul
    {
        background: #283a4dc4;
    }

    .ipsItemStatus.ipsItemStatus_large.ipsItemStatus_read
    {
        background: #3a434b;
    }

    #snow_toggle_button.enabled:hover > .switcher
    {
        background: #1e7abf;
    }

    .cke_inner
    {
        border: 1px solid #1b2734;
    }

    .ipsButton.ipsButton_link
    {
        border-left: 0;
    }

    .ipsQuote_citation
    {
        margin: 0px -16px;
        border-width: 0px 1px 1px 1px;
        border-style: solid;
    }

    .ipsApp .cke_widget_wrapper:hover > .cke_widget_element
    {
        outline-color: #1f2936;
        outline-width: 2px;
    }

    .ipsApp .cke_widget_wrapper:hover .cke_widget_editable,
    .cke_widget_wrapper.cke_widget_focused > .cke_widget_element,
    .cke_widget_wrapper .cke_widget_editable.cke_widget_editable_focused
    {
        outline-color: #242f3d;
    }

    html[dir="ltr"] .ipsComposeArea_unavailable.ipsComposeArea_withPhoto .ipsComposeArea_editor:before
    {
        border-right-color: #1f2936;
    }

    .ipsCustomInput input:checked + span,
    .ipsCustomInput input:focus + span
    {
        border-color: #276899 !important;
    }

    .ipsCode
    {
        border-left: 5px solid #276899 !important;
    }

    .ipsApp select:focus-visible
    {
        outline: 1px solid #276899 !important;
    }

    a.cke_combo_button,
    .cke_combo_off a.cke_combo_button:hover,
    .cke_combo_off a.cke_combo_button:focus
    {
        background-image: none !important;
    }

    .ipsComposeArea_dummy,
    #cbInput_container input
    {
        border-radius: 4px;
    }

    .ipsReactOverview ul img
    {
        border: 2px solid #1a2430;
    }

    #ipsEmbedLoading:before,
    #ipsEmbedLoading span:before,
    #ipsEmbedLoading:after,
    #ipsEmbedLoading span:after,
    body[data-role="internalEmbed"] #ipsEmbedLoading span:after
    {
        opacity: 0;
    }

    .cPastLeaders_cell:after
    {
        opacity: 0.5;
    }

    .ipsSideMenu_item.ipsSideMenu_itemActive
    {
        margin: 1px;
    }

    .ipsReact_button
    {
        filter: grayscale(47%) hue-rotate(360deg) saturate(125%) contrast(56%);
    }

    .ipsEmoji[data-src][data-loading]
    {
        animation: none;
    }

    #elSearchExpanded
    {
        border-radius: 0px 0px 5px 5px;
    }

    .cke_button_arrow,
    .cke_combo_arrow
    {
        border-top-color: #c5c5c5;
    }

    .ipsSelectTree
    {
        background: #242f3d !important;
    }

    ::-webkit-input-placeholder
    {
        Color: #b3b3b3;
    }

    /* Scroll */
    ::-webkit-scrollbar-track
    {
        -webkit-box-shadow: inset 0 0 5px #283a4d;
        border-radius: 0px;
        background-color: #283a4d;
    }

    ::-webkit-scrollbar
    {
        width: 12px;
        background-color: #4F555C;
    }

    ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb
    {
        border-radius: 4px;
        -webkit-box-shadow: inset 0 0 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, .3);
        background-color: #4F555C;
    }

    /* Resize */
    ::-webkit-resizer
    {
        background: #4C5259;
    }

    /* NumericUpDownOff */
    input::-webkit-outer-spin-button,
    input::-webkit-inner-spin-button
    {
        -webkit-appearance: none;
        margin: 0;
    }

    input[type=number]
    {
        -moz-appearance: textfield;
    }

    /* Triangles */
    .ipsMenu.ipsMenu_bottomCenter:after,
    .ipsMenu.ipsMenu_bottomCenter:before
    {
        border-color: transparent transparent #17222d transparent;
    }

    .ipsHovercard_stemBottom .ipsHovercard_stem
    {
        border-color: transparent transparent #1b2734 transparent;
    }

    .ipsHovercard_stemBottom .ipsHovercard_stem:before
    {
        border-color: transparent transparent #101921 transparent;
    }

    html[dir="ltr"] .ipsFollow .ipsCommentCount:after
    {
        border-color: transparent #dedede transparent transparent;
    }

    html[dir="ltr"] .ipsComposeArea_withPhoto .ipsComposeArea_editor:before
    {
        border-color: transparent #242f3d transparent transparent;
    }

    html[dir="ltr"] .ipsStream_withTimeline .ipsStreamItem:after
    {
        border-color: transparent #242F3D transparent transparent;
    }

    .ipsHovercard_loading:after
    {
        border-color: #242F3D transparent transparent transparent;
    }

    .ipsMenu.ipsMenu_topRight:after
    {
        border-color: #17222d transparent transparent transparent;
    }

    .ipsMenu.ipsMenu_topRight:before
    {
        border-color: #111a22 transparent transparent transparent;
    }

    html[dir="ltr"] .ipsStream_withTimeline .ipsStreamItem.ipsStreamItem_contentBlock:before
    {
        border-color: transparent #17222d transparent transparent;
    }

    .ipsMenu.ipsMenu_topCenter:after
    {
        border-color: #17222d transparent transparent transparent;
    }

    .ipsMenu.ipsMenu_bottomLeft:before
    {
        border-color: transparent transparent #121b24 transparent;
    }

    .ipsMenu.ipsMenu_bottomLeft:after
    {
        border-color: transparent transparent #1f2936 transparent;
    }

    .ipsHovercard_stemTop .ipsHovercard_stem:before
    {
        border-color: #1F2936 transparent transparent transparent;
    }

    .ipsHovercard_stemTop .ipsHovercard_stem
    {
        border-color: #1F2936 transparent transparent transparent;
    }

    .ipsMenu.ipsMenu_topCenter:before
    {
        border-color: #101921 transparent transparent transparent;
    }

    .ipsTooltip.ipsTooltip_top:after
    {
        border-color: #283a4d transparent transparent transparent;
    }

    .ipsTooltip.ipsTooltip_bottom:after
    {
        border-color: transparent transparent #283a4d transparent;
    }

    html[dir="ltr"] .ipsTags .ipsTag:before,
    html[dir="ltr"] .ipsTag_prefix:before
    {
        border-color: transparent transparent #276899 #276899;
    }

    .fa-pencil-square:before
    {
        content: 'ðŸ¸';
    }

    .main_menu > li > a,
    .main_menu > li > a:before,
    .main_menu > li > a:after
    {
        background: url("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MoriDanWork/RS-Night-Theme/main/Resourses/Menu_Hover.png") repeat-x 0 44px;
    }

    .ipsApp select:not( [multiple])
    {
        background-image: url("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MoriDanWork/RS-Night-Theme/main/Resourses/Select_dropdown.png");
    }

    .cke_button__bold_icon
    {
        background: url(https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MoriDanWork/RS-Night-Theme/main/Resourses/Buttons.png) no-repeat 0 0px !important;
    }

    .cke_button__italic_icon
    {
        background: url(https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MoriDanWork/RS-Night-Theme/main/Resourses/Buttons.png) no-repeat 0 -24px !important;
    }

    .cke_button__underline_icon
    {
        background: url(https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MoriDanWork/RS-Night-Theme/main/Resourses/Buttons.png) no-repeat 0 -120px !important;
    }

    .cke_button__strike_icon
    {
        background: url(https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MoriDanWork/RS-Night-Theme/main/Resourses/Buttons.png) no-repeat 0 -48px !important;
    }

    .cke_button__removeformat_icon
    {
        background: url(https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MoriDanWork/RS-Night-Theme/main/Resourses/Buttons.png) no-repeat 0 -912px !important;
    }

    .cke_button__justifyleft_icon
    {
        background: url(https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MoriDanWork/RS-Night-Theme/main/Resourses/Buttons.png) no-repeat 0 -768px !important;
    }

    .cke_button__justifycenter_icon
    {
        background: url(https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MoriDanWork/RS-Night-Theme/main/Resourses/Buttons.png) no-repeat 0 -744px !important;
    }

    .cke_button__justifyright_icon
    {
        background: url(https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MoriDanWork/RS-Night-Theme/main/Resourses/Buttons.png) no-repeat 0 -792px !important;
    }

    .cke_button__justifyblock_icon
    {
        background: url(https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MoriDanWork/RS-Night-Theme/main/Resourses/Buttons.png) no-repeat 0 -720px !important;
    }

    .cke_ltr .cke_button__numberedlist_icon
    {
        background: url(https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MoriDanWork/RS-Night-Theme/main/Resourses/Buttons.png) no-repeat 0 -888px !important;
    }

    .cke_ltr .cke_button__bulletedlist_icon
    {
        background: url(https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MoriDanWork/RS-Night-Theme/main/Resourses/Buttons.png) no-repeat 0 -840px !important;
    }

    .cke_button__textcolor_icon
    {
        background: url(https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MoriDanWork/RS-Night-Theme/main/Resourses/Buttons.png) no-repeat 0 -312px !important;
    }

    .cke_button__ipsemoticon_icon
    {
        background: url(https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MoriDanWork/RS-Night-Theme/main/Resourses/Buttons.png) no-repeat 0 -456px !important;
    }

    .cke_button__ipsquote_icon
    {
        background: url(https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MoriDanWork/RS-Night-Theme/main/Resourses/Buttons.png) no-repeat 0 -672px !important;
    }

    .cke_button__ipslink_icon
    {
        background: url(https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MoriDanWork/RS-Night-Theme/main/Resourses/Buttons.png) no-repeat 0 -528px !important;
    }

    .cke_button__ipscode_icon
    {
        background: url(https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MoriDanWork/RS-Night-Theme/main/Resourses/Buttons.png) no-repeat 0 -432px !important;
    }

    .cke_button__ipsspoiler_icon
    {
        background: url(https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MoriDanWork/RS-Night-Theme/main/Resourses/Buttons.png) no-repeat 0 -696px !important;
    }
}
